<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00007" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="artifactId>javaee-api<"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="javax javaee-api artifactId has been replaced by jakarta.platform jakarta.jakartaee-api">
                        <message>Update artifact dependency by replacing the `javaee-api` artifactId with `jakarta.jakartaee-api`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                        <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-pom-dependencies-platform-profile" type="REPLACE">
                               <replacement>jakarta.jakartaee-api</replacement>
                               <search>javaee-api</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
